## Project Details
- **Framework**: Nuxt.js with Vue 3
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Deployment**: Static build for GitHub Pages
- **Game**: Judgement/Kachufool card game with local multiplayer
- **Storage**: Browser cache for game persistence
